greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (3*Pi)/8.
comment: Area of an astroid with a = 1.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 20080); x=3*Pi/8; for (n=1, 20000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b093828.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 18 2009
(MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(110)); R:= RealField(); 3*Pi(R)/8; // _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 11 2019
xref: Cf. A161685 (continued fraction). - _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 18 2009
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Apr 16 2004
